title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Social Media
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Social Media              Social Media       Join the Conversation Do you have a question about something you saw on the river today? Or about what you might see there when you come visit? Maybe you have some advice for first-time paddlers, or some native plant lore to share. The social media team at Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area would like to invite you to join us online in a more interactive setting. Visit our Facebook page and post your questions, comments, photos, and videos. Follow us on Twitter and get updates on river conditions and upcoming events in the park.
